Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the last few years delayed reactions several hours after the injection of radiographic and contrast materials ( PRC ) have been described with increasing frequency .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Chemical" entities:

1. Radiographic material: This is a chemical substance used in medical imaging to produce images of internal structures of the body.
2. Contrast material: This is another chemical substance used in medical imaging to enhance the visibility of certain structures or tissues during imaging procedures.

Both of these chemical entities are injected into the body, which is why the author mentions "injection of radiographic and contrast materials (PRC)" in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Chemical.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Chemical" in the given paragraph:

1. Radiographic material
2. Contrast material

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Chemical".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |

| Contrast material |
